text: It looks like Miranda Lambert and Gwen Stefani's feud over Blake Shelton is far from over! According to a new report, The Voice coach is ready for Blake's ex - wife to leave his name out of her mouth after Miranda seemingly threw shade at the ` ` Honey Bee'' singer during her ACM's acceptance speech for Album of the Year. MORE : Miranda Lambert Announces Her Engagement! “ Gwen thinks Miranda really needs to focus on her current relationship and not her ex. Gwen gets that Miranda ’ s split with Blake was heartbreaking but come on, it ’ s time to move on, ” a source told Hollywood Life. “ Gwen struggled to get over Gavin [ Rossdale ] but she did it and now it ’ s all about her relationship with Blake.
